desc: SafeVR holds the world's first personal VR Omni-Directional Treadmill - A new generation mechanical device that allows for 360 degrees of human motion, creating infinite movement area in VR on minimum physical space in reality. Optimized entirely for gamers. For professionals we have our most advanced headsets yet.

layout.text: Virtual reality like never seen before
Movement with complete safety. Never stop moving. Experience the game.
